description:
This panel will be an opportunity for members of the Open Data Platform Initiative to share the benefits of ODP with the Apache community.


Speakers
Anjul Bhambri
VP, Big Data, IBM

Konstantin Boudnik
VP, Open Source Development, WANdisco

Owen O'Malley
Co-founder & Sr Architect, Hortonworks

Roman Shaposhnik
title: Keynote Panel ODPi Advancing Open Data
